diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// BinaryOpMutation(`-` |==> `+`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            playerResponses[msg.sender].length+1
         );
     }
name: mutants/208/src/AgentTrumpGame.sol

diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// BinaryOpMutation(`-` |==> `*`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            playerResponses[msg.sender].length*1
         );
     }
name: mutants/209/src/AgentTrumpGame.sol

diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// BinaryOpMutation(`-` |==> `/`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            playerResponses[msg.sender].length/1
         );
     }
name: mutants/210/src/AgentTrumpGame.sol

diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// BinaryOpMutation(`-` |==> `%`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            playerResponses[msg.sender].length%1
         );
     }
name: mutants/211/src/AgentTrumpGame.sol

diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// BinaryOpMutation(`-` |==> `**`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            playerResponses[msg.sender].length**1
         );
     }
name: mutants/212/src/AgentTrumpGame.sol

diff:
--- original
+++ mutant
@@ -146,7 +146,8 @@
             currentMultiplier,
             response,
             block.number,
-            playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1
+            /// SwapArgumentsOperatorMutation(`playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1` |==> `1 - playerResponses[msg.sender].length`) of: `playerResponses[msg.sender].length - 1`
+            1 - playerResponses[msg.sender].length
         );
     }
